summary: This is an email from defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim to the court and government, transmitting an unredacted version of Ghislaine Maxwell's reply memorandum in support of her bail application under seal in her criminal case.

events.title: Submission of Bail Reply Memorandum
events.description: Defense attorney Bobbi C. Sternheim submits an unredacted reply memorandum in support of Ghislaine Maxwell's pending bail application to the court and government under seal.

locations: 33 West 19th Street - 4th Floor, New York, NY 10011
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell's defense team, led by Bobbi C. Sternheim, was actively pursuing her bail application as of March 2021.
The submission was made under seal, indicating sensitive or confidential information in the bail arguments.
The document shows the operational status of Sternheim's law office during COVID-19, working remotely with the West 19th Street office closed.
The case is U.S. v. Ghislaine Maxwell 20 Cr. 330 (AJN), presided over by Judge Alison J. Nathan (AJN).
